Whats new?

NIRF 2024 Rankings are out. As per the latest NIRF 2024 rankings, Amity University Noida ranks #30 under the category 'Engineering'.

Amity University Noida admissions 2025 are open for all UG, PG, and Diploma courses. The last date to apply is Mar 15, 2025. Interested candidates can check and apply through the official website. A few more updates are given below:

  • The MAT 2025 registration process for the Feb session is ongoing for CBT, and the last date to apply is Mar 12, 2025. Further, the MAT 2025 PBT and CBT will be held on Mar 9 and Mar 23, 2025, respectively.
  • The GATE 2025 results for admission to the ME/Mtech/PhD courses are scheduled to be announced on Mar 19, 2025.
  • The GPAT 2025 registration process for admission to the MPharma course will commence on Apr 1, 2025. As per the schedule, the GPAT 2025 exam is to be held on May 25, 2025.
  • The CUET UG registration 2025 is open for admission to UG courses, and the last date to register is Mar 22, 2025. Additionally, the CUET UG 2025 exam will be conducted tentatively between May 8 and Jun 1, 2025.
  • The NMAT 2024 Phase 2 exams are now ended for admission to MBA/PGDM courses for the academic session 2025-27.
  • The NEET PG Counselling 2024 stray vacancy round has ended with the seat allotment result declaration for admission to the MD, MS, and PG Diploma courses.
  • The CMAT 2025 result has been released for admission to the MBA, PGDM, and MMS courses. Registered candidates can log in and check or download their scorecards from the official website.

Amity University, Noida Courses and Fees 2025

Amity University, Noida offers a variety of programmes across different levels, and to get admissions into these courses, candidates must fulfil the eligibility criteria specified by the Amity University, Noida. All these programmes are available in multiple streams, such as Engineering, Medicine & Health Sciences and Business & Management Studies, and more. Candidates seeking admission to this institution can select from a list of courses based on their past qualification and interest area. Below is a comprehensive table listing all the Amity University, Noida courses, along with the eligibility and tuition fee:

Commonly asked questions
On Fees and Eligibility

Q: What is the fee for MBA at Amity Noida?

A: 

Amity Noida offers MBA course is variety of specialisations. Those who secure admission to this course must pay Amity University Noida MBA fee at the time of admission. The total amount of Amity Noida MBA fee for both years ranges between INR 6.4 lakh - INR 26.4 lakh. This fee ranges contains the fee for all MBA specialisations. It may include various components including Tuition Fee. Students also have to pay an additional amount of INR 1,500 at the time of registration. The lowest fee range is given for MBA in Agriculture & Food Business and the highest fee is for MBA (General) course. 

However, this information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. Students are advised to visit the official website to know more about Amity Noida MBA fee structure.

Upvote

Q: How can I get admission to Amity Noida for BBA?

A: 

In order to get admission to Amity Noida, there is no entrance exam required. Amity University BBA admission is merit-based, where students are selected based on their performance in the previous qualifying exam. Candidates who pass Class 12 in any stream are likely to get admission to Amity Noida BBA course. 

In the recent years, PI round has been cancelled for BBA course and instead of this, candidates are required to submit a video response. In this round candidates need to record and submit their answers comprising queries related to an Introductory question, a question to test English Language Skills and a subject-specific questions in a video format. Candidates will be evaluated based on their responses submitted in a video format on the official website of Amity Noida.

Upvote

Q: Is Maths compulsory for BCom (Hons) at Amity Noida?

A: 

No, Maths is not compulsory for admission to Amity Noida BCom (Hons) course. However, for BCom (Hons) admission candidates must have secured Class 12 with Maths with an aggregate of 70% (65% for Sponsored category students).

Upvote

Q: What is the cost to study BA at Amity University Noida?

A: 

Amity University Noida BA admissions are done for both Non-Sponsored categories. The fee may vary for the respective categories. As per the official website, the Amity University fee for BA (Hons)/ BA (General) ranges between INR 1.6 lakh - INR 13.2 lakh for all three-years of the course. It may include various components including Tuition Fees for all BA specialisations, including International and Evening courses. 

Apart from this fee, candidates also have to pay an additional amount of INR 1,500 at the time of registration. The lowest range of Amity University BA fees is applicable for BA General course and the highest fee is given for BA (Mass Communication - International) and BA (Applied Psychology - International) courses. 

Upvote

Q: Is Amity University Noida good for BTech?

A: 

Amity University Noida provides BTech in top specialisations of the field such a Aerospace Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering, Bioinformatics, Biotechnology, Civil Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, Avionics, etc. At Amity Noida, students also get access to study international courses such as (3 Continent) Mechanical Engineering, CSE, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Food Technology (International), Electrical & Electronics Engineering - International, etc. 

The university has been ranked by one of the top-ranking bodies of India, i.e., NIRS, in the list of top 100 Engineering colleges category. The latest ranking trends comparison of Amity University Noida for the Engineering category is given below:

Ranking Body

Further, the placement records for the year 2023 have been good for Amity University BTech placements. During the placement drive of the year 2023, the top recruiters such as Flipkart, Adobe, Accenture, TCS, etc., visited during the campus placements. The highest package stood at INR 61.75 LPA.
